service.title: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol Status Code 308 (Permanent Redirect)
service.documentation: This document specifies the additional Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) status code 308 (Permanent Redirect).

http-status.documentation: The 308 (Permanent Redirect) status code indicates that the target resource has been assigned a new permanent URI and any future references to this resource ought to use one of the enclosed URIs.
